channel.title: Compatibilities on NEP
channel.description: Recent content in Compatibilities on NEP

item.title: Programming languages
item.description: NEP in CSharp We are still working in this documentation page Last update 29/01/2018 It is possible to communicate C# applications (using NetMQ) and python nodes written with NEP (using ZeroMQ). To install NetMQ in a C# project we need to open the Package Manager Console (Tools/NuGet Package Manager/Package Manager Console) and write: Install-Package AsyncIO -Version 0.1.26 Install-Package NetMQ -Version 4.0.0.1 Install-Package Newtonsoft.Json About NetMQ version Tested only in NetMQ version 4.
